[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/answers-headless](./answers-headless.md) &gt; [combineFilters](./answers-headless.combinefilters.md)

## combineFilters() function

Creates a [CombinedFilter](./answers-headless.combinedfilter.md) by applying the specified [FilterCombinator](./answers-headless.filtercombinator.md) to the two filters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function combineFilters(filterA: FilterTypes, filterB: FilterTypes, combinator: FilterCombinator): CombinedFilter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filterA | [FilterTypes](./answers-headless.filtertypes.md) | The first filter to be combined |
|  filterB | [FilterTypes](./answers-headless.filtertypes.md) | The second filter to be combined |
|  combinator | [FilterCombinator](./answers-headless.filtercombinator.md) | Specifies how the two filters should be joined |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CombinedFilter](./answers-headless.combinedfilter.md)

The newly created [CombinedFilter](./answers-headless.combinedfilter.md)
